item.title: Privacy Policy for Kana Flick and Mobile Applications by Scott R Christian
item.description: Introduction This Privacy Policy applies to Kana Flick! and all other mobile applications developed by Scott R Christian. I am committed to protecting your privacy. For any questions or concerns, please contact me at hello@scottrchristian.com. Data Collection Our applications, including Kana Flick!, do not collect, store, or share any personal or sensitive user data. This includes, but is not limited to, your name, email address, location, device information, or usage data.
